snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include a video of Aaron Swartz's keynote address at last year's Freedom to Connect conference, Facebook removing the...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include a video of Aaron Swartz's keynote address at last year's Freedom to Connect conference, Facebook removing the ability to opt out of searches and a study that casts some doubt on how much people use Facebook.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Web Headlines and Swartz Speech
